pages.title: Anvil Crushing
pages.text: Lots of AE2's items can be crushed to dust using an anvil: $(thing)Certus Quartz(), $(thing)Fluix(), $(thing)Skystone() and $(thing)Ender Pearls().
In desperate need of $(thing)Charged Certus Quartz$()? $(l:resources/storm_stone)Storm Stones$() will charge them up in a heartbeat.
...and then create $(thing)Fluix$() from it, if you get impatient.
Being crystalline structures, $(thing)Certus Quartz$() and $(thing)Fluix Crystals$() can be grown in the Crystallarieum.
